definition: to confer/to discuss/to engage in talks
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: I would like to discuss with you our agency of your electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 我想同貴方商談你們電電扇的署理問題。

sentences.english: A: I think you know already that I want to discuss the representa- tion for your alarm clocks.
sentences.chinese: 想必你已知道，我想和你商談你方鬧鐘的代理問題。

sentences.english: We hope that a representative will soon be appointed to come here for the discussion on the compensation.
sentences.chinese: 望速派人前來商談有關賠償事宜。

sentences.english: Sit down with your accountant or bookkeeper to prioritize your payables.
sentences.chinese: 和您的會計師坐下來商談您的應付賬款。

sentences.english: I have something to square up with you.
sentences.chinese: 我有點事要和你商談解決一下。

sentences.english: My manager was very busy,so I stood in for him to talk with them.
sentences.chinese: 經理太忙，由我代他和他們進行了商談。

sentences.english: Trade talks are to be held by nongovernmental organizations of both sides.
sentences.chinese: 雙方由民間團體出面商談貿易。

sentences.english: I haven't spoken with the Viola about Bojinov or Manuele Blasi.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有商談博季洛夫和布拉西的事情。

sentences.english: Distribute work orders to the productive workshop personnel in consultation with the respective section heads.
sentences.chinese: 與車間工長商談後把工作分派到生產工人手中。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss with you the problem of agency for your electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 人念同貴方商談你們電風扇的代理成績。

sentences.english: I've come to talk about the feasibility of a joint venture.
sentences.chinese: 我來是爲了商談合資經營的可能性。
我們可以坐下來一起商談一下。

sentences.english: Miramax Films is said to be in discussions to board "Eyre."
sentences.chinese: 據說米拉麥克斯公司也在商談《簡愛》的合作。

sentences.english: After fruitless negotiations, he turned down the job.
sentences.chinese: 在與公司商談無果後，他拒絕了這份工作。

sentences.english: The agent of Chelsea midfielder Frank Lampard has held talks with Juventus powerbrokers.
sentences.chinese: 蘭帕德經紀人庫特納與尤文德代表進行了商談。

sentences.english: However,we would like to negotiate the price first.
sentences.chinese: 不過，我希望先商談關於價錢的問題。

definition: to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
variant of 籌劃|筹划[chou2 hua4]
to establish/to found/to create (a good environment)
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
